channel.title: Travel on Tony Duan
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Tony Duan

item.title: 서울 | Seoul
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Seoul" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Seoul") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[37.566535,126.9779692,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Seoul",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[37.566535,126.9779692],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[37.566535,37.566535],"lng":[126.9779692,126.9779692]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

item.title: 臺北 | Taipei
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Taipei" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Tokyo") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[25.0329694,121.5654177,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Tokyo",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[25.0329694,121.5654177],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[25.0329694,25.0329694],"lng":[121.5654177,121.5654177]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

item.title: 東京 | Tokyo
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Tokyo" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Tokyo") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[35.6894875,139.6917064,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Tokyo",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[35.6894875,139.6917064],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[35.6894875,35.6894875],"lng":[139.6917064,139.6917064]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]}

item.title: Hà Nội | Hanoi
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) location=geocode( "Hanoi" ) m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Hanoi") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[21.0277644,105.8341598,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Hanoi",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[21.0277644,105.8341598],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[21.0277644,21.0277644],"lng":[105.8341598,105.8341598]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} coffee Egg coffee @ The Giang Café and Coconut coffee @ Cong Caphe .Two are in my top 10 coffee list. Food Street food is health and crazy good. Other Full of motorbike and Traffic jam
